price: Cyangwa gutanga amafunguro ku munsi w’amapfa,
arabic: أَوۡ إِطۡعَٰمٞ فِي يَوۡمٖ ذِي مَسۡغَبَةٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: aw iṭ'ʿāmun fī yawmin dhī masghabatin
